title: Apprentice
fluff: Masters of the mystic arts, the Runesmiths of the dwarven homelands are the keepers of ancient lore and the wielders of arcane knowledge. Drawing upon their formidable tradition of knowledge and skill, these sage-like crafters fashion powerful magics from the very rock and stone around them, creating powerful runes that protect against harm, and infusing their armament with unequalled strength and potency.

reward.name: Great Forge.
reward.value: When a runesmith reaches the title of Runelord, they may build a Great Forge, an incredible structure designed to shelter their knowledge and craft within. With its magical essence, the Great Forge will provide a centre of learning and experimentation, where the Runelords will be able to conduct safe tests and develop new creations. When the construction is complete, a number of incredibly talented acolytes will arrive to serve their Runelord and help them build the future of the world.
